item.description:
Join NHC'er Lori for a fun and social evening of trickery, deceit, lies and sleuthing. The Guests will enjoy live music and hors'deurves when suddenly a murder occurs and the participants determine the motive and solve the crime. Prizes and awards will be presented based on best actor, best costume, most outrageous accent, and best super sleuth.

Please note: Pre-registration is required and there is a $20.00 admission fee per person. To register call Lori Larsen at (203)-933-2200.
item.name: Murder Mystery Gala!
